subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Trent Hunter signed a one-year deal with the Islanders after an arbitrator awarded him a salary of $1.55 million for next season. Hunter, a 27-year-old right wing who was a restricted free agent, had 20 goals and 15 assists last season in 77 games.
